summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 8th Avenue in the City of Seattle, from Yesler Way to Alder Street, by grading, parking and side walking the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 24045 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefore, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
